result.title: Fourth (online) Battle of Giants Russia-China
result.content:
Today on the problems of X Vekua Cup, Grand Prix of Southern Caucasus fourth (online) Battle of Giants Russia:China is held. First three battles were based on the Ural Championships. Winner of onsite Battle of Giants in 2013 is Russia, winner of online Battle of Giants in 2014 is China, and winner of online Battle of Giants in 2015 is Russia again.

Russian team is composed of 5 first NEERC teams qualified to the World Finals. Chinese team is composed from teams qualified to the World Finals.

Current standings of the Battle

P.S. Result of match: 33:33, Russia wins by better penalty time (4134:13 vs 4147:48).
